p: Figure 1 presents a flow chart of the search; 1154 articles were identified (PubMed: 115, EMBASE: 567, Scopus: 518, and Web of Science: 732) after duplicate articles had been deleted. After reading the title, we removed articles that were unrelated to essential oils and inflammation and 132 were thus retained. Finally, 15 articles were selected after full-text browsing, among which 12 articles included in vivo experiments, 9 articles included in vitro experiments, and 7 articles included in vivo and in vitro experiments.
